archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: EXT: DigiIdentity [Idp]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Identity assurance solution used to provide a certified level of assurance of a user's identity. A Government digital service Identity Provider (IdP) for access to government services, of which Post Office is one (i.e. branded DigIdentity service).
Used by CDP for My Account logons and to master user accounts.
